name: Skully's Misfortune [PROTOTYPE]
description:
--- INFO ---
Skully's Misfortune is currently in a prototype stage and was made as thank you for my subscribers over at Youtube.

This game is ment to look like a game that could have been played on a Gameboy, maybe something for in the future...

Also : Collect all shards to find a hidden message, good luck!

--- CONTROLS ---
A simple control system for the game =)

AD = MOVEMENT
SPACEBAR = JUMPING 
ESC = QUIT GAME
R = RETRY STAGE
E = INTERACTION

--- SOCIALS ---
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO9VPWphWuHAQ30X-BeMu6A
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KindoSaurProd

--- EXTRA ---
There are still some issues and bugs left in the game but there is one that can help you collect ALL the "Shards"
